name: Trireme (Trireme)
description:
This is a 2D tactical shooter which you can play with your friends. It involves precise gunplay, and breakable boxes ( that's right breakable boxes because we like Fortnite)

You need to host the game ......so good luck. 

For hosting a game you need an extra device and you also need to port forward your connection with an external router If you are not planning to play on LAN. Now if you know how to do these and still have friends to play this game with, congratulations you are a rare species.

We are amateur developers and this was our first attempt at game developing .
